org.anddev.andengine.opengl.view
Class GLSurfaceView.GLThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.anddev.andengine.opengl.view.GLSurfaceView.GLThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
GLSurfaceView
 class GLSurfaceView.GLThread
extends java.lang.Thread

A generic GL Thread. Takes care of initializing EGL and GL. Delegates to a Renderer instance to do the actual drawing. Can be configured to render continuously or on request.
